definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: I also do the deep breathing and self-massage mentioned above as I do so.
sentences.chinese: 在闲步中也做上文提到的深呼吸和自我推拿运动。

sentences.english: In fact, the preceding text in Hebrews calls us to show hospitality to strangers.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，这段经文的上文，亦吩咐我们要接待客旅。

sentences.english: As mentioned, the press is on the main floor of the plant.
sentences.chinese: 上文已经提到，压机在工厂的第一层。

sentences.english: On second thoughts, that introductory paragraph needs a little clarification.
sentences.chinese: 斟酌再三之后，本人有必要对上文段落作出小小澄清。

sentences.english: Qestion:What can we learn from the passage?
sentences.chinese: 我们从上文可以知道什么？

sentences.english: The art story above might be an exception.
sentences.chinese: 上文提到的美术故事可能是个特例。

sentences.english: This contradicts what was mentioned above.
sentences.chinese: 这与上文提到的有些矛盾。

sentences.english: This part infers the Baise speech according to preceding text analysis to be supposed to be south the cassiabarktree the Cantonese Nanning yongxun piece.
sentences.chinese: 这部分根据上文分析推断百色话应属桂南粤语邕浔片。

sentences.english: A consumer-led rebalancing addresses many of the tensions noted above.
sentences.chinese: 由消费者带动的重新平衡缓解上文所述的众多的紧张。

sentences.english: Part of the reason why nudists are perceived by non-nudists as unattractive while nude is simply due to the facts already discussed.
sentences.chinese: 部分认为裸癖者毫无吸引力的原因上文已讨论。

sentences.english: As I mentioned above please do leave a comment if you have any suggestions, thought or insights.
sentences.chinese: 如同我上文所说，如果你有任何意见建议，欢迎留言。

sentences.english: Note how it says “Choose” above, as it is your choice.
sentences.chinese: 注意上文所说的“选择权”，因为它是你的选择。

sentences.english: Think back to the example of the tabs from above.
sentences.chinese: 回顾上文提到过的选项卡的例子。

sentences.english: I know I said above to forget squats, but I meant squats with weights.
sentences.chinese: 我上文所说的忽略蹲坐，指的是负重的蹲坐。

sentences.english: The histograms shown here demonstrate that different clouds are good at different tasks.
sentences.chinese: 上文显示的图表明不同的云擅长不同的任务。

sentences.english: And at last repeat the above-mentioned for three minutes.
sentences.chinese: 末了，复述上文所练习过的内容，做三分钟口语作文。

definition: to mention/to raise (a subject)/to refer to
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
to hit the target/to hit the nail on the head
